description:
Aiden goes to the top of my list of super-friendly and gregarious guys to hang with.
There is just something about him. He loves to laugh, and has a politeness and an intelligence that you can tell allows him to ease in to any situation. Including beating off on my couch.
He did a great job on the photos, but when I busted out the videos, he suddenly got nervous. You can see him blush red in his photoset every time he dropped his drawers.
His video has probably the longest interviews I have included in a solo. I just couldn't help myself, he was just too adorable! He is shy and giggled nervously as I switched on the cams. I love his body language as he covers his mouth to laugh. And yet he has that sly dawg in him- like any red-blooded American dude!
Not sure if you guys watch the interviews, but this is one to not skip through. Yeah, it's the same 'ole questions, but when it comes to a solo, I think it's important to get that intimate interview so you know who you are dealing with.
Aiden's cumshot is pretty amazing too..where did all that come from?!
title: Aiden Evans - Solo
